ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Why Paul is wrong about resource discovery via hypertext
ygData.msgSnippet: A resource can be identified before it exists.  For example, at the recent AC meeting, the IRC logs of the minutes were given HTTP URIs before the meeting took

A resource can be identified before it exists.  For example, at the
recent AC meeting, the IRC logs of the minutes were given HTTP URIs
before the meeting took place.  This is a very useful side effect of
permitting 404s.

MB
-- 
Mark Baker, CTO, Idokorro Mobile (formerly Planetfred)
